name: Monsieur Cellule and Madame Cellule the Game
name_original: Monsieur Cellule and Madame Cellule the Game
description:
By Nicholas Papadoulakis. This game is based on my biology comic book that I made back in the 9th grade of Junior High School of Amberia, Chania, Crete. 

Hint:

Help Monsieur Cellule and Madame Cellule to select all the stars and save their mouse friends from the hands of Dr. Louis and Dr. Mawaa. Controls: the arrows of the keyboard.
